description: Hope you all had a great start to 2026! Amigoo Ventures is thrilled to brew our morning OTC Coffee Meet up for the second time in HK. Our small pax private event is exclusively for those active in the Secondary/ OTC/ Liquid markets. Usually our event attracts leadership teams from the projects, foundations, hedge funds, VCs, liquid funds, family offices, and deal flow partners. So, come have a coffee with us and let s do some networking and deals. Who is this event for: Token Listed Projects, Secondary Token Investors, OTC Brokers. Who this event not for: Pre TGE Projects, CEXs, Marketing Agencies, Market Makers, Dev Shops, and other service providers. The event location will be revealed only to the approved participants.
